alert.note: Alert for Inland Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 1:48PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Polk and northeastern Hillsborough Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 147 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Medulla, or near Lakeland, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lakeland, Plant City, Winter Haven, Haines City, Bartow, Auburndale, Fussels Corner, Combee Settlement, Lakeland Linder Airport, Medulla, Jan Phyl Village, Lake Alfred, Mulberry, Eagle Lake, Lake Hamilton, Homeland, Winter Haven Airport, Wahneta, Winston, and Willow Oak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
